email-exists-message: It looks like there's already an account using that email. Please login or use a different email to continue.
succes-message: Thanks for using our service. We'll send you an email to confirm the event.
Tak for at du bruger vores service. Vi sender dig en mail til at bekræfte eventet.
succes-message-2: Would you like to receive notifications when you get a new offer?
Vil du modtage besked når du får et nyt tilbud?
no-djs-message: Sorry, we don't have any DJs available.
Desværre, vi har ingen ledige DJs.

header: Check if we have DJs available
Se om vi har ledige DJs
event-location-description: Venue name or city where the event is happening.
Navnet på stedet eller byen hvor begivenheden afholdes.

header: Great, we have DJs available. We need a bit of information to make offers.
Vi har ledige DJs! For at give tilbud har vi brug for lidt mere information.
event-rider-description: Do you need speakers and lights for the event?
Har du brug for højtalere og lys til begivenheden?
event-genres-description: Choose what kind of music do you need, or let us choose suitable music genres based on your other selections and event description.
Vælg hvilkent slags musik ønsker du, eller Lad os vælge passende musikgenrer baseret på dine andre valg og event beskrivelse.

header: Thanks! Please tell us a bit more.
guests-description: ${ prefix } ${ amount } people attending the event.
event-description-description:
What is the budget? 
What is the age of the guests? 
What kind of venue is it? 
Do you have any special requirements? 
Hvor stort er budgettet? 
Hvad er alderen på gæsterne? 
Hvilken slags lokation er det? 
Har du nogle specielle krav?

header: Great! We're finding DJs now. How can we get back to you?
Vi finder DJs nu. Hvordan kan vi kontakte dig?
contact-phone-description: Your phone number is only shared with qualified DJs.
Dit telefonnummer bliver kun delt med kvalificerede DJs.
contact-email-description: Your email is only shared with qualified DJs.
Din email bliver kun delt med kvalificerede DJs.
